properties.description: A warm, welcoming, cafe environment with lots of activities for all ages, including toddler groups, post-natal classes, art groups, hobbies groups, alpha groups, scrabble clubs, and a book club. Hot and cold food and drinks available.

Tea, coffee and biscuits, magazines/newspapers, play equipment/toys, library/book swap, charging facilities, free and accessible parking, baby changing facilities

Sandwiches and pastries on Thursday – noon to 2pm

.

Dog friendly.

Pastoral support/1 to 1 support with someone with mental health experience and counselling.

Free Christmas lunch on Christmas Day for anyone.
properties.title: Church of the Transfiguration

properties.address: Woolpack Hub, 3 Commercial Road, Bedford MK40 1RB
properties.description:
Hot drinks and sandwiches can be purchased from the Salvation Army coffee shop.

Most people that attend the drop-in are BSL users however everyone is welcome.

If you’re nervous about joining, look out for volunteers wearing the Access Bedford t-shirt who will introduce you to people.

hours._text: Friday 8 March: 11am–2pm; Friday 22 March: 11am–2pm; Friday 4 April: 11am–2pm; Friday 19 April: 11am–2pm
